Posts.Content: I am praying for Trish also. I know that GOD is there when you need him in whatever way you may need HIM. Love and Best Wishes, Missy
Posts.Title: Regarding Irishwhispers

Posts.Content: Hello, I'm a little nervous about my appointment tomorrow....er....today... Obviously not sleeping but not sleeping is becoming a "norm" in my life. It's amazing how lonely it is at this hour of the day. Any bits of encouragement to help me through my appointment will be appreciated. Love, Missy
Posts.Title: meeting radiation doc tomorrow
